description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Crystaloid is a breakout game.Clone of the famous Breakout game Arkanoid. Features: -More than 40 Levels -17 Power up(Fire,catch,Stretch,More balss,Lazer ball....) -Continue Support
